translations: n．戏剧演员，演员：从事戏剧表演的人。
· The thespians in the play were very talented.
这部戏剧中的演员非常有才华。

sentences.sentence: The thespians were rehearsing the play.
sentences.translation: 演员们一直在排练这出戏。

sentences.sentence: Broadway was full of loafing thespians in search of next season engagements.
sentences.translation: 百老汇大街上挤满了闲荡的演员，在寻找下个季度的演出机会。

sentences.sentence: Thespians, he found, also tend to marry people with the same level of learning.
sentences.translation: 他发现演员们也倾向找与自己学历相等的人结婚。
